pages.text: Mine this block to obtain $(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#speed_energy_item)Energy Items$(/l)$(br2)Spawns when $(l:ex_aid/mobs/genm_mob)Kamen Rider Genm$(/l) or $(l:ex_aid/mobs/cronus)Kamen Rider Cronus$(/l) is summoned$(br2)Drops:$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#bug_energy_item)Bug Energy Item$(/l) (8%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#speed_energy_item)Speed Energy Item$(/l) (4%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#iron_energy_item)Iron Energy Item$(/l) (4%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#instigate_energy_item)Instigate Energy Item$(/l) (4%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#jump_energy_item)Jump Energy Item$(/l) (4%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#muscle_energy_item)Muscle Energy Item$(/l) (4%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#shrink_energy_item)Shrink Energy Item$(/l) (4%)

$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#stretch_energy_item)Stretch Energy Item$(/l) (4%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#invisible_energy_item)Invisible Energy Item$(/l) (4%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#confusion_energy_item)Confusion Energy Item$(/l) (4%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#emission_energy_item)Emission Energy Item$(/l) (4%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#reflect_energy_item)Reflect Energy Item$(/l) (4%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#save_energy_item)Save Energy Item$(/l) (4%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#reverse_energy_item)Reverse Energy Item$(/l) (4%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#giant_energy_item)Giant Energy Item$(/l) (4%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#liquid_energy_item)Liquid Energy Item$(/l) (4%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#dark_energy_item)Dark Energy Item$(/l) (4%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#balloon_energy_item)Balloon Energy Item$(/l) (4%)

$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#end_energy_item)End Energy Item$(/l) (4%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#halt_energy_item)Halt Energy Item$(/l) (4%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#flatten_energy_item)Flatten Energy Item$(/l) (4%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#lucky_energy_item)Lucky Energy Item$(/l) (4%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#sleep_energy_item)Sleep Energy Item$(/l) (4%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#recover_energy_item)Recover Energy Item$(/l) (4%)
